title: Finally, scientists solved the mystery of Bermuda's triangle?
subtitle: A whole storm of sensational scientific television, led by the evaluation, and the very lazy press driven by the click, resulted in a viral story that literally explains nothing about "the Bermuda Triangle."
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Photos of Hexagon-shaped holes in the clouds above the Bermuda Triangle prove that large explosions of sunken air are the cause of shipwrecks and mysterious aircraft crashes in the area.
